task.summary: PR html report code style (no JSON data) change and in the list kendo list view change (data list sent from Action Service as JSON)
url property added to PtBacklog and related adjustments
add url on search task type drop down
url added with use case id
backlog owner id assigned to bug owner id during add to mytask from active
implementation of PO html view which are not JSON data and kendo list view by using kendo template which are JSON data
